There's nothing suspicious about this place,

27098.<left>この農園は 自然野菜を愛する\n<left>オルフェア町民の共同出資:
The farm is jointly funded by the residents of
Orphea who love natural vegetables.
Why not try a vegetable-centered lifestyle?

27099.<left>リンクル湖。\n<left>晴れた日には 湖の向こうに\n<left:
Wrinkle Lake.
On a clear day, you can see Queen Alwe's villa
across the lake.

27100.<left>ダンダダ団参上！ と落書きされている。:
''The Robbin' 'Ood Gang is coming!''
is scribbled.

27101.<left>この辺り レッドベリーのなる木。\n<left>そのままだと からく:
Trees with buzzberries in this area.

are too spicy.

27225.<center>↑坂を上ると プペラトンネル\n<center>↓道なり 風車の:

27229.<left>ここは 聖地パサラン団子山。\n<left>ふもとに眠る 聖人パサラ:
This is the Sacred Pasaran Dango Mountain.
At the foot of the mountain, the will of saint
Pasaran overflows with light to ward off evil.

27230.<left>←ハニーレイク経由 チョッピ荒野\n<right>聖地パサラン団子山:

27231.<left>これより先 底なし穴あり。\n<left>足元を確認の上 充分に注意:

27261.<left>この先 崩れゆく廃墟。\n<left>魔物の棲み家となっているため:
Crumbling Ruins ahead.
It is forbidden to enter, as it is the home of
monsters.

27263.<left>ここは 荒野の休息所。\n<left>かつては 鉱山で はたらく者た:
This is the Wilderness Retreat.
It was once used as a place to stay for those
who worked in the mines.

27266.<center>↑チューザー地下空洞\n<left>←メギストリス領\n<rig:

27455.<left>奥に見えるのが 大蛇の巣。\n<left>危険なので 柵の中に入った:
In the back is the nest of the giant snake.
Don't go inside the fence, it's dangerous.

27466.<left>この先 多くの胞子が飛んでいます。\n<left>巨大きのこの 下に:
There are many flying spores ahead.
Stay away from under the giant mushrooms.

27467.<left>三闘きのこと呼ばれる 大きな三色のきのこは\n<left>争いの絶え:
The large tricolor mushrooms are called the
Three Funguys. The brothers fought, angering
the gods, who turned them into to mushrooms.

27468.<left>きのこは 栄養豊富な食材ですが\n<left>毒があるものも ありま:
Mushrooms are a nutritious food, but they can
also be poisonous. Always go mushroom hunting
with an experienced hunter!

27469.<left>この先 土砂崩れのため 閉鎖中\n<left>危険なので 立ち入るべ:
The area ahead is closed due to a landslide,
so please do not enter.

It's very dangerous to rush on the train
before the door closes.

32700.<left>ランプ錬金設備の 看板だ。: It's a lamp alchemy facility sign.

32727.<left>ランプ錬金設備の 看板だ。: It's a lamp alchemy facility sign.

32735.<left>ツボ錬金設備の 看板だ。: It's a pot alchemy facility sign.

44127.<left>いつも 噴水公園をキレイに使っていただき\n<left>ありがとうご:
Thank you for always using the Fountain Park
beautifully.

44366.<left>いつも 噴水公園をキレイに使っていただき\n<left>ありがとうご:
Thank you for always using the Fountain Park
beautifully.

44546.<left>メギストリスの都を再現した 模型がある。\n<left>まるで おと:
There is a model of the City of Megistris.
It's like a castle from a fairy tale.

44547.<left>英雄フォステイルの 肖像画だ。\n<left>絵の中の英雄は すずし:
<left>It's a portrait of the hero, Fostail.
<left>The hero depicted is smiling coolly.

44548.<left>メギストリス王妃の肖像画 と記してある。\n<left>絵の中の王妃:
<left>''Portrait of Megistris' Queen'' is written.
<left>The queen depicted is tenderly smiling.

44549.<left>小さきものを あなどるなかれ。\n<left>時に かよわき花の根が:
Don't underestimate small things. The root of
a small flower can penetrate the largest rock.
That's the spirit of Megistris Swordsmanship.

44550.<left>メギストリス公認チームに入ると\n<left>お菓子が たっぷり 食:
When you join an official Megistris team, you
get to eat lots of sweets!
......is an urban legend.

44551.<left>メギストリスの都を再現した 模型がある。\n<left>まるで おと:
There is a model of the City of Megistris.
It's like a castle from a fairy tale.

44588.<left>キラキラ大風車塔へ ようこそ！\n<left>クルクル回る風車を見上:
Welcome to Glitter Windmill Tower!
When you're dizzy from looking up at the
spinning windmill, rest in our inn's soft bed!

44589.<left>キラキラ大風車塔のヒ・ミ・ツ<heart>\n<left>空に浮かぶ:
Glitter Windmill Tower Secret <heart>
I heard that the colorful balloons floating in
the sky have a Pukulipo weather lady in them!

44590.<left>つらくたって 悲しくたって\n<left>いつもニコニコ プクリポ印:
No matter how hard or sad it is, I always have
a smile on my face, a Pukulipo smile.
～ Glitter Employee Guidelines

44591.<left>お疲れ顔の 旅人さんは\n<left>ケーキみたいに あま～い笑顔で:
The weary traveler is treated with a smile as
sweet as a cake.
～ Glitter Employee Guidelines

44592.<left>ボクもキラキラ キミもキラキラ\n<left>かがやく旅の思い出は:
''I'm glittery, you're glittery. The memory of
our glittery journey is in Glitter Windmill
Tower!'' is written in a flyer on a wall.

44593.<left>王家の儀式に 身を捧げた\n<left>歴代メギストリス王の勇気に敬:
Let us erect a golden statue here in honor of
the courage of the past kings of Megistris,
who dedicated themselves to the royal ritual.

44616.<left>アルウェ王妃の愛した花が 今年も咲きました！\n<left>ぜひ メ:
Queen Alwe's beloved flowers have bloomed
again this year! Please come and visit us at
Megistris Castle Garden.

44617.<left>当厨房の メギス鶏のからあげは\n<left>最高級メギス鶏の モモ:
Our Megis fried chicken is made using only the
finest Megis chicken thigh meat. We are proud
of this dish that we worked on for years.

44618.<center>魔瘴注意\n<left>紫色のモヤモヤが見えたら きっと魔瘴です:
Miasma Warning
If you see purple haze, it's probably miasma.
You should pukudash away immediately!

44619.<left>左の掲示板を 先に読んだキミは\n<left>パーティの ボケ担当か:
If you read the board to the left first, you
might be the funny man of the party! I'm sure
you're going to make a joke.

44620.<left>右の掲示板を 先に読んだキミは\n<left>パーティの ツッコミ担:
If you read the board to the right first, you
might be the straight man of the party! I'm sure
you'll think of a comeback.

44621.<left>古びた写真が 貼ってある。\n<left>別荘の前で 幼いラグアス王:
There's an old photo on the wall.
A young Prince Raguas and his parents in front
of their villa with smiles on their faces.

44622.<left>ぼくのおかあさん と書かれた\n<left>つたない絵が 貼ってある:
There is a poorly drawn picture on the wall
that says, ''My mom''.

44623.<left>最近の病気 ケガの記録\n<left>食べすぎ ３件 訓練中に転んで:
Recent Illnesses, Injury Records
3 x Overeating, 2 x Scratch from a fall while
training, 1 x Bump pinky finger on a wardrobe.

44624.<left>お夜食のケーキは ほどほどにしないと\n<left>プクプクプクリポ:
You'll end up like a puku puku pukulipo if you
eat too much cake as a midnight snack!
～ From the head maid.

44625.<left>プクランド大陸に発生する 魔瘴の対策について\n<left>いろいろ:
There are various suggestions written down on
how to deal with the miasma occurring on the
Pukuland Continent.

45544.<center>きのこ愛好家の皆様！\n<center>今年も ポポリアきのこ山:
Calling all mushroom lovers!
  It's that time of year again to love the 3
warring shrooms of Popolia Mushroom Mountain!

45545.<center>空を飛び 炎を吹き 姿を消す\n<center>奇跡のエンターテ:
Here's miraculous entertainment that flies
through the air, breathes fire and disappears!
～ Nab Nab Grand Circus Troupe

45546.<left>オルフェアの町へ いらっしゃい♪\n<left>ここは 町のあちこち:
Welcome to Town of Orphea ♪
This is a strange town where the whole place
is made of candy ♪

45547.<left>大地の箱舟が 来たときは\n<left>ビスケットの線の 後ろまで下:
When the Ark of the Earth arrives, please
stand back behind the cookie line and wait.

45548.<left>ボクもキラキラ キミもキラキラ\n<left>かがやく旅の思い出は:
I'm glittery, you're glittery. The memory of
our glittery journey is in Glitter Windmill
Tower!

45549.<left>ご出発なさる お客様\n<left>思い出の お忘れ物は ございませ:
If you're departing, do you have any memories
you'd like to share with us?
We look forward to seeing you again.

45550.<left>ようこそ 花いっぱいの メギストリスの都へ！\n<left>色とりど:
Welcome to flower-filled city of Megistris!
A garden of colorful flowers and blooming
smiles invites you into a world of dreams.

45551.<left>掲示板に 小さく 好きと書いてある。\n<left><pc>は なん:
There's a small sign on the bulletin board
that says ''I love you''. It made you feel happy
somehow.

86183.<LEFT>調理ギルド本部の 看板だ。: It's a cooking guild headquarters sign.

86184.<LEFT>調理ギルド本部の 看板だ。: It's a cooking guild headquarters sign.

123441.仲間モンスターと ともに\n研究に ご協力くださる 冒険者 募集中！\n:
We're looking for adventurers who can help us
with our research!
  ~For more details, contact Dr. Stoneberg.~

212119.黒板には 怪しげな機械の設計図や\n謎の数式が ところせましと\nびっしり 書き:
Written on the blackboard are blueprints for a
suspicious machine, and mysterious formulas
all over the place.

212120.巨大な装置からは 魔瘴の気配を感じる。\nどうやら この装置で\n魔瘴の成分を:
You can feel the presence of miasma from the
huge device. Apparently, they're using this
device to analyze the contents of the miasma.
